      Observer method to retrieve the Card currently represented by this CardPanel.
      Card Player.playCard(int index)
      plays a card from the hand on to the board, as long as the board does not exceed its card limit of 7 cards modifies the player's Wildcat Points resource accordingly
      Methods in project.lima that return types with arguments of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Methods in project.lima with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.addCardtoBoard(Card card)
      adds a card to board, doesn't necessarily need to be in a player's hand
      void Player.addCardToHand(Card card)
      adds any card to the player's hand
      void CardPanel.getNewCard(Card card)
      Method to set the given card as the Card represented by this CardPanel and to reset all attributes of the CardPanel accordingly.
      void Player.removeCardFromBoard(Card card)
      removes a card from the board by searching for that Card's attributes through the board array
      Constructors in project.lima with parameters of type Card 
      Constructor and Description
      CardPanel(Card card)
      Constructs a new CardPanel to display a given Card on the GUI and initializes its attributes to correspond to the given Card.
